(Simplified: 瘿)
Chinese Definition:
①中醫指多因鬱怒憂思過度，氣鬱痰凝血瘀結於頸部，或生活在山區與水中缺碘有關的病。可分爲“氣癭”、“肉癭”及“石癭”等。
②病理學指機體組織受病原刺激後，局部細胞增生，形成的囊狀性贅生物。植物受病菌、昆蟲、葉蟎、線蟲等寄生後，常形成“癭”。
(Simplified: 瘿)

癭字的基本解释

癭
yǐng
见“瘿”。

癭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》於郢切，上静，影。］
“瘿1”的繁体字。
(1)囊状肿瘤。多生于颈部，包括甲状腺肿大等。
(2)虫瘿。树木外部隆起如瘤者。
(3)指累赘、多馀的东西。

癭字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癭； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页783第05
【唐韻】【集韻】於郢切【?㑹】幺郢切，?音癭。【說文】頸瘤也。【釋名】癭，嬰也。在頸嬰喉也。【嵆康養生論】頸處險而癭。【張華·博物志】山居多癭，飲泉水之不流者也。【方書】癭有五，肉色不變爲肉癭，筋脈現露爲筋癭，筋脈交絡爲血癭，憂惱消長爲氣癭，堅硬不移爲石癭。　又地名。【後漢·桓帝紀】勃海王悝降爲癭陶王。【註】癭陶縣屬鉅鹿郡。又【集韻】伊盈切，音嬰。義同。　【集韻】或作??。

Basic explanation of words
gall
yǐng
See "Gall".
gall
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guangyun" Yu Yingqie, Shangjing, Ying. ]
"瘿1" in traditional characters.
(1) Cystic tumors. Mostly born in the neck, including goiter and so on.
(2) Insect galls. The outside of the tree bulges like a tumor.
(3) Refers to cumbersome and redundant things.
gall
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　瘿; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 783 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Yu Ying cut [? 㑹] Unit Ying cut,? Yin gall. [Said the text] neck tumor also. [Release name] Gall, baby. In the neck baby throat also. 【Rongkang Health】Dangerous galls around the neck. [Zhang Hua·Natural History] There are many galls in the mountains, and there are not many people who drink spring water. [Fangshu] There are five galls, the flesh color does not change into flesh galls, the veins and veins appear as sinew galls, the veins and veins are interlocked as blood galls, the worries grow and fall into gas galls, and the hardness becomes stone galls.　Also place name. [Later Han·Emperor Huan] The king of Bohai was reduced to the king of pottery. [Note] Yingtao County belongs to Julu County. [Jiyun] Yi Yingqie, Yinying. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or as ??.
